meanings.definition: The quality of being easy or enjoyable to read.
meanings.sent1: The readableness of the book made it a favorite among young readers.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the readableness of this article; it's so clear and simple to understand.
meanings.sent3: The readableness of the font in the menu made it easier for everyone to order quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her writing had a magical readableness that transported the reader to another world.
meanings.sent5: The readableness of the instructions was crucial for the success of the experiment.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being readable.
meanings.sent1: The readableness of the text on the sign was important for drivers passing by.
meanings.sent2: The readableness of the document was enhanced by the use of bullet points.
meanings.sent3: The readableness of the map helped the lost hikers find their way back to the trail.
meanings.sent4: The readableness of the code was crucial for the programmers to understand and debug it.
meanings.sent5: The readableness of the label on the medicine bottle prevented any confusion about the dosage.
